data.actual_result: The spelling of the word doesn't change.
data.expected_result: The spelling of the word is supposed to change.
data.short_description: Spellcheck doesn't correct word in My Account menu.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to settings ––> My Account. - Go to your username. - Clear your username and start to type a new username. - Purposely spell a word incorrectly so you see the red line underneath. - Right-click it so you see the menu with the correct spelling of the word. - Select the word with the correct spelling and observe that it doesn't change the spelling of the word. Observe the video.
